text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hey, King, the reason you became the Cheer Squad Captain was 
because you wanted to cheer Kawakami on, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Eh. T-that's…… I wonder? T-t-t-t-t-t-that's not 
something a top Cheer Captain like me would do, 
showing favoritism for one Uma Musume is-……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Wa～, so obvious. It's only a matter of time until everyone finds out. 
……and that you're seriously doing your best as the Captain.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's why what I'm about to tell you, who's doing their best, 
is a secret between us, King.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Eh. What do you mean――

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……it's something embarrassing for me though！ Anyways, the whole 
reason I even joined the Cheer Squad this yearー

text_block_list.name: Fishmonger Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, Na-chan and…… the Captain you mentioned before？ Sounds like 
both of you are workin' hard！ I'm rootin' for ya！

text_block_list.name: Liquor Store Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
It's kind of weird to be cheering on a Cheer Squad though…… 
Fufuu. That's right, how about some juice？ Here！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, thanks. Old man, old lady.

text_block_list.name: Liquor Store Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Think nothin' of it！ Everyone here's part of Na-chan's Cheer 
Squad, after all！ Fight O, right！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Cheer Squad？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha…… they don't have anything 
like uniforms or a giant drum though.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But, the reason I wanted to try out being on the Cheer Squad was 
because of this Cheer Squad right here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……I knew that I was aiming too high. But I just couldn't give up 
on it. Even if I was out-of-place on that grand stage.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And then, when I got a good look, I understood just how big of a 
stage it was. Before I realized it, it was too late to regret it. 
……my legs felt weak.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Even my hands were shaking, but it was at that moment

text_block_list.name: Shopping District People
text_block_list.text: Na-cha～～n！ Do your best～！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……their voices telling me to do my best was enough to straighten 
me out and push me forward.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……really, they're an amazing Cheer Squad, you know. These people 
here. To the point where someday I wanted to be able to cheer 
someone on like that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And that's why, King, how about having these Cheer Squad senpai 
show you a few things? You might learn something good, you know?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……So that's why you brought me here――

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So now I'm passing you off to the Shopping District people here！ 
……don't look at me like that. Things like talking about dreams, 
I'm not suited to that kind of thing……！

text_block_list.name: Greengrocer Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Hm～mmm, a secret to cheering？ Let's see…… 
for me it would be sincerity I suppose. What about you？

text_block_list.name: Meat Shop Owner
text_block_list.text:
Let's see～…… Alright, if Na-chan needs our help we'll have a 
strategy meeting！ Everyone～, gather up～～！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Eeh！？ A-a meeting is overkill…… 
It's fine if you just give us a few pointers.

text_block_list.name: Tea Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Well well, brainstorming with everyone? 
Then maybe I should put on some coffee……

text_block_list.name: Tofu Vendor Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh～～！ The old lady's coffee, that sounds good. 
Alright～ let's all do our best～！

text_block_list.name: Shopping District People
text_block_list.text: Oooohh～～！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……This is, Nature-san's Cheer Squad.

text_block_list.name: Snack Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, even though it's so late they're still rowdy, huh? 
When it comes to Na-chan, everyone's so enthusiastic.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Ah. No, when they're all together like this, 
they really look like a proper group.

text_block_list.name: Snack Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Oh! ……if that's how you think, I'm glad. 
After all, it's probably this shopping district's claim to fame.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Is there someone that acts as a Captain？ When 
it comes to cheering for Nature-san, is there 
anything particularly special you do？

text_block_list.name: Snack Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I don't know if we have anything like that…… 
We don't have anyone that we'd call a Captain, and 
we don't really prepare anything special.

text_block_list.name: Snack Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
……just raising our voices, taking each others hands. 
Just wanting to cheer on Na-chan together, I don't 
even know if our voices were ever in synch.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
………… 
Just raising your voices, and taking each others hands…… is it?

text_block_list.name: Snack Shop Old Lady
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, sorry it seems like I'm just saying a bunch of obvious 
things. These are things a Captain probably already knows, huh？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……No. So those are the basics, it seems.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Nature-san！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hm, King？ Did you get some good advice？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes. Very much so. That's why――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Let's keep working hard together.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh……？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…………Hmm…… 
……it's very plain, but I was thinking of starting from the basics!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
We're part of the same "Squad" after all. We'll all cheer, and 
together show our appreciation. Solidarity is―

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
――not about following someone. Maybe it starts with wanting to 
create something together with someone.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……！ Fuu…… Fufuu. 
So that's what this is. ……so this is your gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaa, King, you're really awkward…… and too serious. It kind 
feels like some kind of drama. Like a colleague handing you a 
coffee on the rooftop.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But…… Yeah, let's do our best. 
To cheer on those participating in events at the Appreciation Festival.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
…………Fuhaa, oh man. Now I'm spouting cheesy lines. 
I can't say I've grown at allー

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
To me, I couldn't be happier to hear those words. 
……so, would you mind accepting this？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Fufuu, but sweet red-bean, huh…… 
quite the kingly choice, don't you think？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……and what's wrong with that？ Out of all the 
choices in the vending machine it seemed like 
the one most likely to warm you up！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……for your help today, thank you very much. 
Thanks to you I think I might have gotten just the hint I needed.

text_block_list.name: Tofu Vendor Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's good, that's good！ Do your best 
out there, Captain-san！ That's right, if 
you ever find yourself stuck again……

text_block_list.name: Tofu Vendor Old Man
text_block_list.text:
You should try asking the previous Captain, Bamboo-chan. 
That girl's cheering was amazing, after all！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……！ That's right, asking last year's captain for advice sounds 
like a good idea！ Alright, we'll talk to Bamboo-san――

text_block_list.name: King & Nature
text_block_list.text: Eeh, Bamboo-san！？
